title: Bracelet, one of a pair
description: bracelet, cuff-like, one of a pair; cuff-like loop of thick silver; ends have a water-buffalo relief in a panel; center of bracelet has a dragon-like lizard and a turtle fighting; turtle has fin(?) on back; background of dots; rim of silver on all edges; images are relief
creditline: The Suzanne S. Roberts Fund for Asian Art
